channel.title: Max Karma in SMF
channel.description:
I did post this on MSCP, and I was given the correct code, but it doesn't work, and not to many people seem to look through the General Questions over there.
Anyways, I was trying to set a limit on Karma to 100. I was given [code]if ($user_karma_good > 100) $user_karma_good = 100;[/code] but it doesn't seem to work, as I can still give over 100 REP. I've already seen http://www.moparisthebest.com/downloads/Karma.phps so don't point me in that direction, please.
EDIT: SMF 1.1.11
If anyone could give me further help, I would be very thankful.
Thanks, Ryan
